name: @fuji-calendar/shared
description: Shared utilities and types for Fuji Calendar

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && echo 'export const APP_CONFIG = { NAME: "Fuji Calendar", VERSION: "0.4.0" }; export const API_ENDPOINTS = { CALENDAR: "/api/calendar", LOCATIONS: "/api/locations", EVENTS: "/api/events" };' > dist/index.js && echo 'export declare const APP_CONFIG: { NAME: string; VERSION: string; }; export declare const API_ENDPOINTS: { CALENDAR: string; LOCATIONS: string; EVENTS: string; };' > dist/index.d.ts
